statements: SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city='New York';
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50;
SELECT city, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE city='Los Angeles';
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY temperature DESC, humidity ASC;
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY city DESC, temperature ASC
SELECT AVG(temperature), MAX(humidity) FROM weather_data WHERE city='New York'
SELECT city, humidity, wind_speed FROM weather_data WHERE humidity < 50 AND wind_speed > 10 ORDER BY city ASC, wind_speed DESC
SELECT city, AVG(temperature) AS average_temp FROM weather_data GROUP BY city HAVING AVG(temperature) > 20 ORDER BY average_temp DESC
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE city='London' OR city='Paris' OR city='Tokyo' LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 30;
SELECT forecast_date, precipitation FROM weather_forecasts WHERE precipitation < 0.1;
SELECT * FROM road_conditions WHERE road_name = 'Highway 101';
SELECT road_name, condition, traffic_status FROM road_conditions WHERE construction = TRUE;
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT city, precipitation FROM weather_forecasts WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-07-31' ORDER BY city ASC;
SELECT city, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_forecasts WHERE city = 'New York' AND precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT road_name, condition, traffic_status FROM road_conditions WHERE construction = TRUE ORDER BY road_name ASC;
SELECT city, forecast_date, temperature, precipitation FROM weather_forecasts WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND temperature BETWEEN 15 AND 25 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts;
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE forecast_date = '2022-03-15';
SELECT road_name, traffic_status FROM road_conditions WHERE weather_condition = 'Rainy';
SELECT * FROM driving_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC;
SELECT city, temperature, weather_condition FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city, forecast_date, temperature, weather_condition FROM weather_forecasts WHERE city = 'New York' AND temperature > 80 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT road_name, weather_condition, traffic_status FROM road_conditions WHERE traffic_status = 'Heavy' AND weather_condition = 'Rainy' ORDER BY road_name ASC;
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY city, temperature DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_description FROM driving_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id;
SELECT city, forecast_date, weather_condition FROM weather_forecasts WHERE weather_condition IN ('Sunny', 'Cloudy') ORDER BY forecast_date, city;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts;
SELECT road_name, road_condition FROM road_conditions WHERE traffic_flow = 'Heavy Traffic';
SELECT database_name, database_url FROM external_databases ORDER BY database_name DESC;
SELECT id, strategy_name, distance_to_vehicle FROM adaptive_strategies WHERE speed_limit > 60;
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM weather_forecasts;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT temperature, conditions FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 30 AND conditions = 'Sunny';
SELECT road_name, traffic_flow FROM road_conditions WHERE traffic_flow = 'Heavy' ORDER BY road_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM adaptive_strategies WHERE speed_limit < 60 OR distance_to_vehicle > 100 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT database_name, database_url FROM external_databases WHERE credentials IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM weather_forecasts ORDER BY city DESC;
SELECT id, forecast_date, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE city='New York';
SELECT city, forecast_date FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE forecast_date BETWEEN '2022-09-01' AND '2022-09-30';
SELECT city, forecast_date, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE city='London' AND temperature < 20;
SELECT city, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY city ASC
SELECT city, forecast_date, temperature FROM weather_forecasts WHERE city = 'New York' AND temperature < 10 ORDER BY forecast_date DESC
SELECT city, issue_datetime, alert_message FROM weather_alerts WHERE city = 'Los Angeles' AND issue_datetime > '2023-01-01' ORDER BY issue_datetime ASC
SELECT road_name, condition FROM road_conditions WHERE traffic_level > 3 ORDER BY road_name DESC
SELECT road_name, condition, traffic_level FROM road_conditions WHERE condition LIKE '%wet%' ORDER BY traffic_level DESC, road_name ASC
